name: Connection (Garenz)
description:
Cooperate with your team to cut through enemies with your lasers!

Connection puts up to 4 players on the same screen to survive a minimalist onslaught within the confines of a small arena. A laser will be drawn between players that can see each other and these lasers will destroy enemies; be careful though, the enemies can still hurt you if they manage to avoid the lasers!

Each level has a different layout with game-changing tiles affecting your strategy. 

-Grey tiles are your normal tile, no bonus here

-Blue tiles are slippery, these make changing direction difficult

-Green tiles give your player a major speed boost

-Brown tiles greatly slow your player

-Red tiles kill any player that touches them, enemies remain unharmed, however

Connection currently has:

 - 15 levels

 - up to 4 player support

 - 6 unique enemy types
